description: The round payoff this round was 81. You, Kate chose to play option 1.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 40.5.
Mutual selection of option 1 maximizes individual and collective payoffs
The game has two Nash equilibria: mutual cooperation (both 1) and mutual defection (both 2), with the former being Pareto optimal
Transparent action revelation enables trust-building, encouraging sustained cooperation
Unilateral defection (choosing 2 when the other chooses 1) harms both players, removing short-term incentives to defect
